MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L9 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Lancaster Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  5:13PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:55PM on 27th February 2021.
